text: In a slum of Jerusalem, a certain anonymous disciple of Jesus was disputing with the sultan's wives. -Magdalena fell in love with the rabbis - said one. - His love is divine - the man replied. -Divine?... Will you not let me adore her blond hair, her deep eyes, her real blood, her mysterious knowledge, her dominion over men; her beauty, in the end? -There can be no doubt; but she loves him without expectation, and therefore his love is divine. FIN Filosofia, 1924
title: El espíritu nuevo
author: Leopoldo Lugones
